channel.title: Make yell for +donators
channel.description:
Hello, can anyone help me? I've been searching a lot in the Server Tuts.. section but i couldnt find it. have i been looking badly or something? anyways... can any of you give me teh Link? to the guide (if there is one ofc) or if you know how please tell me,
The idea is: Not allow normal players to do ::yell only for +donators then mods/admins/owners.. soo that they stop spamming
ThankX

item.title: Make yell for +donators
item.dc:creator: @Stiflex Stiflex
item.description:
@Stiflex wrote:

[quote=“Rixxx, post:2, topic:341366”]if (command.startsWith("yell")) { String s = command.substring(4); if (donator == 1 || playerRights > 0) { yell(""+playerName+": "+s+""); } else { sM("You cannot yell!"); return; } }[/quote]
Thank you!

Read full topic

item.title: Make yell for +donators
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { String s = command.substring(4); if (donator == 1 || playerRights > 0) { yell(""+playerName+": "+s+""); } else { sM("You cannot yell!"); return; } }

Read full topic
